name: Frost Beat
description:
Warning: There is an audio bug in the web version that causes the audio to horribly stutter whenever the player dies.

A short platformer about a kid and his dog trying to get out of the depths of hell.

Slide on a wall by moving towards the wall after jumping. You can jump off of a wall while in a slide.

A,D, Left Arrow Key, Right Arrow Key  -  Move left and right

W, Up Arrow Key, Space Bar - Jump

Design by WhiteHorse6 and BDP_1

Art by Scratch, Ultimate Chaos, and Briskybit

Sound Design by diethrichdoh with the Soundtrack by Rusty

Programming by Jem and Davinci789

Made with Godot for the My First Game Jam Winter 2020
